author: {'steamid': '76561198113578585', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 138, 'playtime_forever': 30, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1545769280}

author: {'steamid': '76561198298025584', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 398, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 134, 'last_played': 1475140641}
review:
《守护者》(Guardian)是一款射击游戏，游戏场景设定在黑暗的峡谷当中，玩家需要守护封印，确保大魔王不被营救。游戏过程中，会不断有小恶魔袭来，玩家需要拿起手中的双枪，发射射线，消灭它们。
　　游戏操作与玩法十分简单，花上一两分钟玩家就能轻易掌握。不过游戏整体色调比较暗，在背景亮度较低的情况下，同样是暗色系的恶魔很容易与背景混在一起，很难看清，增加游戏难度。且游戏带有死亡设定，玩家右手边有显示生命值的水晶柱，当180点生命值用完，即为死亡。
　　Steam售价为34元，但与同类型游戏相比，并不具备任何游戏，性价比非常低，玩家们需要慎重考虑是否购买。
　　原文地址：http://www.83830.com/game/201610/181351293.shtml
　　更多VR游戏评测：http://newgame.83830.com/

author: {'steamid': '76561198290851745', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1482850874}
review: 游戏画面中等，在一艘船上不停打怪，有法师和剑可以用。法师招停奇怪，用剑挺好玩，剑有两把，一把火。一把冰，可以冻结怪或者群烧，不过就像很多人说的，游戏最终目的干嘛，光是没完没了的打怪。也许是demo原因吧

author: {'steamid': '76561198071662497', 'num_games_owned': 28, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 102, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1561315293}

author: {'steamid': '76561198237243462', 'num_games_owned': 29, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1472544530}
review:
I don't buy a lot of games with zero prior knowledge of them, but the screenshots looked  nice and the price was appealing,so i gave it a shot,And so far ,I'm very pleasantly surprised. It's very good looking(especially for the price),and despite some roughedges(weak animations,rough translation),it'sa shockingly well-made game.
Just got the game,Only one hour in.
Game looks nice,will give it the thunbs up as it's a lovely game for the price.

Cheers!

author: {'steamid': '76561197983689849', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 183, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1472433497}
review:
I based this purchase on the positive initial review. I'm not sure what they saw in the game, but I'm definitely missing it.

This has to be the worst VR cash grab title I've seen. The "combat" and I use the term loosely here, consists of repeatedly waggling your swords back and forth as fast as you can or flicking your rists as fast as you can. Most gesture commands did not work about 50% of the time.

Honestly this looks like a 12 year olds weekend project for Video Game club. I say that and feel like I'm insulting the 12 year old who probably would have put in more effort.

This is definitely NOT a 9.99 title and I will be getting a refund on principle.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aFt_zhyUq60

author: {'steamid': '76561198135359395', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 112, 'last_played': 1473052185}
review:
代入感真的很强，操作的感觉很棒，还能锻炼下身体！
现在只开放了战士跟法师，各有各的玩法，一款游戏能体验不同的乐趣。期待其他角色的开放！
建议法师的手柄也可像战士那样换成法杖什么的武器，更有感觉
希望有更多新内容更新
